name: Paper CI

on:
  push: 
    branches: [main]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - uses: moix-dev/paper-template@v1
        with:
            path: "paper/paper.txt"

      - name: Create or update release
        id: create_release
        uses: softprops/action-gh-release@v2
        with:
          tag_name: latest
          release_name: "Latest Release"
          draft: false
          prerelease: false
          files: ./paper.pdf
        env:
          GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
